Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections

Class BootConnection

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.UDPConnection<BootMessage>
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.BootConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable, BootReceiver, BootSender, Connection, Listenable<BootMessage>, MessageReceiver<BootMessage>, SocketHolder
public class BootConnection
extends UDPConnection<BootMessage>
implements BootSender, BootReceiver
A connection to the SpiNNaker board that uses UDP to for booting.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BootConnection​(java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort)
    Creates a boot connection that binds to all local interfaces on an arbitrary port from the range 1025 to 32767.
    BootConnection​(java.net.InetAddress localHost, java.lang.Integer localPort, java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort)
    Creates a boot connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BootMessage receiveMessage​(java.lang.Integer timeout)
    Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection.
    void sendBootMessage​(BootMessage bootMessage)
    Sends a SpiNNaker boot message using this connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • BootConnection

      public BootConnection​(java.net.InetAddress localHost, java.lang.Integer localPort, java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a boot connection.
      Parameters:
      localHost - The local host to bind to. If null defaults to bind to all interfaces, unless remoteHost is specified, in which case binding is done to the IP address that will be used to send packets.
      localPort - The local port to bind to, between 1025 and 32767. If null, defaults to a random unused local port
      remoteHost - The remote host to send packets to. If null, the socket will be available for listening only, and will throw and exception if used for sending
      remotePort - The remote port to send packets to. If null, a default value is used.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error setting up the communication channel

    • BootConnection

      public BootConnection​(java.net.InetAddress remoteHost, java.lang.Integer remotePort) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a boot connection that binds to all local interfaces on an arbitrary port from the range 1025 to 32767.
      Parameters:
      remoteHost - The remote host to send packets to. If null, the socket will be available for listening only, and will throw and exception if used for sending
      remotePort - The remote port to send packets to. If null, a default value is used.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error setting up the communication channel

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      public BootMessage receiveMessage​(java.lang.Integer timeout) throws java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: MessageReceiver
      Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection. Blocks until a message has been received, or a timeout occurs.
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface MessageReceiver<BootMessage>
      Parameters:
      timeout - The time in seconds to wait for the message to arrive; if null, will wait forever, or until the connection is closed.
      Returns:
      the received message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error receiving the message

    • sendBootMessage

      public void sendBootMessage​(BootMessage bootMessage) throws java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: BootSender
      Sends a SpiNNaker boot message using this connection.
      Specified by:
      sendBootMessage in interface BootSender
      Parameters:
      bootMessage - The message to be sent
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error sending the message
